start.text: This task will be easy for the brave.
Are there any sweets for good little girls?
Hello, evil-doers! We are here to vanquish you.

start_boss.text: May Baba Yaga not take me this fight.

retreat.text: This is impossible! I refuse to accept it!
How can this be? We are great heroes, why did we fail in our quest?

out_of_missiles.text: I have fired my last bullet.

engaged.text: That's right! Give the evil-doers a beating. Make them run back to their foul lairs.
Time for courageous action to punish all those evil-doers.

need_help.text: These villains are not playing around!

pursuing.text: My babusya taught me to hunt this way.
I have the villain in my sights.

running.text: I wonder how heroes in books have coped with this?
This is a bad place. I should leave.

hull_90.text: Not as bad as a smack from my babusya.
I will survive. No great hero dies from wounds.

hull_50.text: Please take care of my babusya if I die.
This is a very dangerous place to be right now!

hull_30.text: Nooooo! Bogatyrs are not supposed to die. This is all wrong.
This is impossible! I refuse to accept it!
It is possible my heroic journey ends here!

overload.text: Some mischievous spirit got in my gun.
I am cursed! If I move, I will surely die.
Uh-oh, talking computer is no longer talking. Must be broken.

death.text: My babusya was right... Do not let Baba Yaga take my body.

victory.text: All done! If you need me, I will be reading my book.
The villains are dead! Now is the time for singing and dancing!
Evil-doers beware! I am stronger and better than ever!

victory_boss.text: No quest is a match for great heroes like us.
